title: If you got a rank for both Flex & Solo, which border do you get?
body: Lets say Im Silver Solo, and Gold Flex, which border do i get?

replies.body:
Yummy actually nailed this one for me earlier! The Borders that show for your loading screen will depend on whatever queue you're in.

We actually have a bullet list for each queue if you'd like to check it out:

- Ranked Solo/Duo - Dynamic Queue
- Ranked Flex 5v5 - Best of Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s
- Ranked Flex 3v3 - Ranked 3s
- Normal Summoner's Rift - Best of Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s
- Normal Twisted Treeline - Best of Dynamic Queue or Ranked 3s
- Co-op vs. AI Summoner's Rift - Best of Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s
- Co-op vs. AI Twisted Treeline - Best of Dynamic Queue or Ranked 3s
- Custom - Best of any queue
- Rotating Game Modes - Best of any queue
- ARAM 5v5 - Best of any queue

We don't have confirmation yet for how they will appear next year, but I can only imagine that it'll be similar. We'll have to wait on that a lil' longer. :)

The border applies to the the loading screen of the specific ranked queue. That means, if you are Silver in 3v3, Gold in Solo Queue and Platinum in Flex Queue you will have a silver border in 3v3, a gold border in Solo Queue and a Platinum border in Flex Queue. hope that this helps have a good day
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
So i have a question.Lets say that i have silver in 3v3 gold in flex and plat in solo/duo.What will i have for normal blind pick and aram?

> [{quoted}](name=ooooooooooooo,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8vzfvOE7,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-10-26T05:40:48.975+0000)
>
> So i have a question.Lets say that i have silver in 3v3 gold in flex and plat in solo/duo.What will i have for normal blind pick and aram?

You'll have plat in both.

> [{quoted}](name=Doujins,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8vzfvOE7,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-10-29T23:33:38.787+0000)
>
> You'll have plat in both.

But, what if i am plat in 3v3 or flex, but im silver in solo/duo? Will i then have plat in normal and aram?

I ve got a question too,rioter thatfatracoon didnt explain really well.i mean,ranked 5s and 3s and dynamic queue dont exist anymore!so he said that in solo/duo u will have dynamic q border?!i dont get it...
{{champion:55}}
Yummy brAKALI explains this fairly well.
I got silver 2 in solo queue but i don't have the border it says I am unranked  :(
